record.id: field.name="queries" and file.name="formatctrl" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: queries
record.file.name: formatctrl

brief.brief: The expression to use to select records from the database table specified in the File Name field.

detail.detail: Once Service Manager selects the records, it makes the data in the additional table is available for reference.
In this example, contact.name is the input field name from the contacts dbdict.

The contact.name does not have to reference a $file name here, but refers instead to the name in the File Name field. You could interpret this expression as contact.name in contacts table=contact.name in problem table.
